APP_PASSWORD_ERROR_MSG: Valid password: 8-30 digits, English letters + numbers + special characters (optional)
APP_DEFAULT_DELETE_WARNING: The delete operation cannot be rolled back. Do you want to continue?
APP_CHANGE_PASSWORD_SUCCESS: Successfully change password! Please log in again!
APP_NETWORK_VXLAN_MSG: 基于隧道，在任何网络环境下都可以正常工作,优势是对物理网络环境没有特殊要求，只要宿主机IP层可以路由互通即可.劣势是封包和解包耗费CPU性能，且额外的封装导致带宽浪费.
APP_NETWORK_HostGW_MSG: 基于路由，不适用于公有云环境,优势是没有封包和解包过程，完全基于两端宿主机的路由表进行转发劣势是要求宿主机在2层网络是互通，且路由表膨胀会导致性能降低
APP_NETWORK_BGP_MSG: 基于路由，不适用于公有云环境优势是没有封包和解包过程，完全基于两端宿主机的路由表进行转发劣势是要求宿主机在2层网络是互通，且路由表膨胀会导致性能降低
APP_NETWORK_IPIP_MSG:
基于隧道，在任何网络环境下都可以正常工作
优势是对物理网络环境没有特殊要求，只要宿主机IP层可以路由互通即可
劣势是封包和解包耗费CPU性能，且额外的封装导致带宽浪费
APP_REGION_PROMPT: Region: Similar to the concept of a region in a public cloud, such as Alibaba Cloud North China1. For vSphere, the region corresponds to Datacenter.
APP_REGION_VCENTER_PORT_HELP: Port to access the vCenter API, for example https: 443
APP_REGION_VCENTER_USER_HELP: User name to access vCenter, for example administrator@vsphere.local
APP_REGION_VCENTER_PARAM_INVALID: Verification failed, please check vCenter connection information
APP_ZONE_PROMPT: Zone: Similar to the concept of AZ in the public cloud, it can be understood as a specific computer room in the region, such as Beijing 1 and Beijing 2. For vSphere, the Availability Zone corresponds to the cluster, and can also correspond to the resource pool under the cluster
APP_PROVISIONER_SYNC_START_SUCCESS: Provisioner synchronization started, please wait a moment...
APP_DELETE_STORAGE_PROVISIONER_ROOK: rook-ceph storage provider does not support direct deletion. Please refer to the link below to delete manually.
APP_PLAN_PROMPT: Deployment Plan (Plan): An abstract concept used in KubeOperator to describe in which region, in which Availability Zones, what machine specifications are used, and what type of cluster is deployed
APP_COPMUTE_HELPER: Select a computing cluster for running virtual machines
APP_RESOURCE_POOL_HELPER: Select the resource pool used to run the virtual machine, Resources is the default resource pool under cluster
APP_DATASTORE_HELPER: Select the storage used to run the virtual machine, if you want to use vsan to dynamically create a PV in the k8s cluster, please select the storage that supports the vsan type
APP_TEMPLATE_CUSTOMIZE_HELPER: Custom templates only support CentOS/RedHat 7.4 and above pure systems
APP_TEMPLATE_DEFAULT_HELPER: The default template is KubeOperator's own template
APP_TEMPLATE_PASSWORD_HELPER: Please select a password from your credentials
APP_NETWORK_HELPER: Select the network adapter used to connect to the virtual machine
APP_IP_START_INVALID: Start IP is not a valid IPV4 address!
APP_IP_END_INVALID: End IP is not a valid IPV4 address!
APP_IP_START_MUST: The End IP must be greater than the start IP!
APP_GATEWAY_INVALID: Gateway IP is not a valid IPV4 address!
APP_NETMASK_INVALID: Subnet Mask is not a valid IPV4 address!
APP_OPENSTACK_ZONE_HELPER: Select Availability Zone for running virtual machines
APP_OPENSTACK_STORAGE_TYPE_HELPER: Choose the type of storage used to run persistent storage
APP_OPENSTACK_SECURITY_GROUP_HELPER: Select the security group to connect to the virtual machine
APP_OPENSTACK_NETWORK_HELPER: Select the network to connect to the virtual machine
APP_OPENSTACK_IPTYPE_HELPER: Select the network type used to connect to the virtual machine
APP_OPENSTACK_SUBNET_HELPER: Select the subnet to connect to the virtual machine
APP_OPENSTACK_FLOATING_IP_HELPER: Select the FloatingIP network to connect to the virtual machine
APP_REGION_OPENSTACK_PARAM_INVALID: Verification failed, please check OpenStack connection information
APP_SYSTEM_DEPLOY_HELPER: The Kubernetes cluster contains both x86_64 and aarch64 architectures, choosing a mix. When there is only one of these architectures, choose a single one
APP_SYSTEM_IP_HELPER: Required, please fill in the IPV4 address of Nexus provided by KubeOperator
APP_SYSTEM_PROTOCOL_HELPER: Required, nexus access address, http or https
APP_RESOURCE_REMOVE_CONFIRM: Are you sure to cancel authorization?
APP_SYSTEM_NTP_SERVER_HELPER: Optional, provide time synchronization service for the cluster
APP_NTP_INVALID: NTP Server is not a valid IPV4 address!
APP_PLAN_PROJECT_HELPER: The deployment plan needs to be authorized to the project to be available
APP_PROJECT_MEMBER_HELPER: Search for users by entering username
APP_NOT_SET_SYSTEM_IP: Please add the corresponding repo in the system settings
APP_NOT_SET_SYSTEM_IP_X86: Please add x86_64 repo in the system settings
APP_BACKUP_ACCOUNT_HELPER: The backup account needs to be authorized to the project first
APP_EFK_CREATE_REPLICAS: Make sure that the number of copies is less than or equal to the number of nodes!
APP_EFK_LOKI_CONDITION: Elasticsearch and Loki do not support enabling at the same time!
APP_GRAFANA_CONDITION: Please enable Prometheus as the default data source first!
APP_EFK_REPLICAS_HELPER: The maximum number of replicas is:
APP_TOOL_WARNING: Disabling this tool will result in data loss. Do you want to continue?
APP_BACKUP_START_SUCCESS: Backup has started! Please check the history later
APP_RESTORE_START_SUCCESS: Restore has started! Please check the history later
APP_SYSTEM_EQUAL: NTP Server cannot be the same as the system IP！
APP_RESOURCE_BACKUP_ACCOUNT_REMOVE_CONFI: Cancellation of authorized backup account will delete backup policy
APP_LDAP_MSG: Note: Users without mail will not be synchronized, and those with the same login name as local users will not be synchronized.
APP_HOST_SYNC_START_SUCCESS: Host synchronization started, please wait a moment...
APP_CREATE_CIS_TASK: Do you want to start the cis task？
APP_SYNC_NOTE: Synchronization starts, please check the user list later
APP_CLUSTER_NAME_HELPER: Support lowercase English, numbers and -  cannot start with a number
APP_ZONE_HELPER: Only zone in normal state can be added to the deployment plan
APP_CLUSTER_IMPORT_ROUTER_HELPER: IP address of any node with kube-proxy and accessible
APP_NOT_RUNNING_CLUSTER_CAN_NOT_UPGRADE: The cluster is not running and cannot be upgraded!
APP_UPGRADE_START_SUCCESS: Upgrade has started! please wait a moment...
APP_DELETE_START: Deletion has started! please wait a moment...
APP_BACKUP_RESTORE: Please upload original files, do not upload compressed files
APP_PLAN_VSPHERE_MSG: Disk size is defined by template
APP_DING_TALK_HELPER: Used for DingTalk to receive alarm messages
APP_DING_TALK_ERROR: Please fill in the correct phone number
APP_WORK_WEIXIN_HELPER:
Used for enterprise WeChat to receive alarm messages.
How to find userid? https://work.weixin.qq.com/api/doc/90000/90135/90665
APP_CLUSTER_HOST_HELPER: The host needs to be authorized in the project-resource first
APP_WORK_WEIXIN_USER_HELPER: Test user for sending test messages
APP_WORK_WEIXIN_DESC: Note: As each company has different message restrictions, KubeOperator does not make active restrictions. Please use it according to your own circumstances.
APP_HEADER_MSG: Please fill in the registry IP on the system setting page
APP_STORAGE_NAME_HELPER: Support lowercase English, numbers and -  cannot start with a number
NETWORK_HELPER: The multi-NIC environment needs to specify the name of the NIC used, and the single NIC environment does not need to fill in
APP_LICENSE_EXPIRED_MSG: Your KubeOperator license is about to expire
NAMESPACE_INVALID: namespace name does not meet the specification
PROVISIONER_DELETE_FAILED: This storage provider is already bound to the storage class and cannot be deleted!
RESET_PWD_SUCCESS: Password reset successfully! Please check mail
APP_SURE_DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete
CREDENTIAL_USERNAME_INVALID: Username cannot be the same as name
USERNAME_PWD_INVALID: Username cannot be the same as password
OCREN_STOR_URL_HELPER: Multiple management IPs are separated by commas, for example："10.1.1.1,10.1.1.2"
OCREN_STOR_POOL_HELPER: Multiple Pool are separated by commas, for example："pool1,pool2"
OCREN_STOR_PORTAL_HELPER: Multiple Logical port IP are separated by commas, for example："test1,test2"
OCEAN_STOR_ISCSI_HELPER: Multiple Logical business IP are separated by commas, for example"10.1.1.1,10.1.1.2"
APP_REGION_FUSIONCOMPUTE_PARAM_INVALID: Verification failed, please check FusionCompute connection information
APP_NFS_HELPER: Please fill in the NFS server address, for example: 172.16.10.10
APP_REGION_NAME_HELPER: Support Chinese and English numbers, underscores, and do not start with a number
APP_ISTIO_STOP_MSG: Are you sure you want to disable cluster istio?
APP_MASTER_HELPER: The number of master nodes must be 1 or 3
IP_PROMPT: Occupied: Manually occupied; In use: There are machines using this IP in the host; Reachable: The host can be pinged;
APP_DATASTIORE_USAGE_HELPER: Prefer datastore with low usage rate
APP_DATASTIORE_VALUE_HELPER: Prefer datastore with more remaining volume
APP_DELETE_NS_ERR: Delete failed, tool already exists in this namespace：
APP_VERSION_ALERT: Kubernetes in the offline package only carries the latest two versions by default. If the current environment is offline, you need to execute the script to generate the old version of Kubernetes offline package and push it to the nexus warehouse.
APP_OCEAN_STOR_AUTHCLIENT:
Mandatory, support to enter the client host name, client IP address, client IP address segment or use "*" to indicate all client IP addresses
Support to specify multiple clients, separated by ";" semicolon
APP_OCEAN_STOR_CLONEFROM: Optional, the format is storage backend name. original volume name
APP_OCEAN_STOR_CLONSPEED: Optional, default value 3, support 1~4, 4 is the fastes
APP_OCEAN_STOR_FSTYPE: Optional, support ext2/ext3/ext4, default is ext4
APP_YUM_REPLACE_MSG: This operation will back up the original yum repo file of the K8S node server, and then generate and use only the yum repo of KubeOperator
APP_YUM_COEXIST_MSG: This operation will keep the original yum repo file of the K8S node server unchanged, and at the same time generate and use the yum repo of kubeoperator
APP_YUM_NO_MSG: This operation will keep the original yum repo file of the K8S node server, and will not do any operation on the yum repo of the K8S node server
APP_POD_SUBNET_HELPER: This project cannot overlap with node network segment and service network segment
APP_SERVICE_SUBNET_HELPER: This project cannot overlap with node network segment and pod network segment
APP_CLUSTER_POD_MAX: Under the current network configuration, the maximum number of cluster pods is
APP_CLUSTER_SERVICE_MAX: Under the current network configuration, the maximum number of cluster services is
APP_CLUSTER_NODE_MAX: Under the current network configuration, the maximum number of cluster nodes is
APP_CIDR_HELPER: CIDR cannot overlap with the target IP segment, otherwise initialization will fail
APP_MAX_NODES_HELPLER: Under the current container network configuration, the cluster has a maximum of

Minimum requirements for VMware environment:
